pageContext.claim: “Where have the Radical Left, Do Nothing Democrats gone when they have spent the last 3 days defending the life of Qassem Soleimani, one of the worst terrorists in history and the father of the roadside bomb?”
pageContext.analysis: Democrats have criticized Trump for offering a dubious justification for the drone strike on Soleimani and for failing to notify Congress before the strike, not because they sympathized with Soleimani.
